markdownRemark.html:
This is my first post on this blog, again …

I used to have the habit of blogging, and all of a sudden lost it in time and maybe got tangled up in learning more stuff about programming, parenting, etc …

The thing is, now I’m starting all over again. As the year starts and we all know th first days of the year have the power to makes us want to start new things … I decided to start blogging again.

The intention is to make this a technical blog, but bare in mind that this is mine and I will post what I feel.

Thanks and welcome.
